name: Caramelized Carrots
description: Think outside the bag –a sweet pudding mix can be used for savoury dishes, too! The sweet base of Dulce De Leche Instant Pudding Mix is ideal for roasted veggies. Caramelized carrots make a great side with roasted meats.

ingredients.name: Dulce de Leche Instant Pudding Mix

preparation: Preheat oven to 425° F. Line Sheet Pan with Sheet Pan Liner.
Place carrots in Multipurpose Steamer. Cover and microwave on high for 5 min to soften.
Toss steamed carrots with onion, pudding mix, and oil until evenly coated. Transfer to pan and roast 13–15 min, or until onions are softened.
perfectlyBalanceYourPlate: Serve with 4 oz (113 g) lean protein and 1⁄2 cup cooked white rice.

products.name: Dulce de Leche Instant Pudding Mix (Pack of 2)
